title: Cannal Crousing
desc: Cruising through the canals of the Sundarbans mangrove forest on a silent boat is an experience unlike any other. As you glide along the tranquil waters, surrounded by the lush greenery and rich biodiversity of this unique ecosystem ...

title: pick & drop
desc: Imagine a charming boat trip arrives to pick you up for resort from Mongla Bus Stand Ferry Ghat.It will be an unique experience of being ferried across by a boat create a delightful and memorable start to your journey.
